    • import { Task } from './../shared/task'; import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-task-list-item', templateUrl: './task-list-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task-list-item.component.css'] }) export class TaskListItemComponent implements OnInit { @Input() public task: Task | undefined; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void { } }
